key_sector_challenge: Legal and regulatory instruments of the SQA are outdated
strategic_objective: Review the legal and regulatory instruments of the SQA to meet requirements of the SQA Act 2021 and national and international developments in education, quality assurance and qualifications frameworks
indicator: Number of legal and regulatory instruments reviewed
indicator_protocol: Regulations, National Qualifications Framework, Qualifications Map. Documents completed per year.

key_sector_challenge: Continuously develop and maintain the National Qualifications Framework.
strategic_objective: Consolidate projects linked to the continuing development of the National Qualifications Framework
indicator: % of qualifications and part qualifications based on unit standards registered
data_sources: Database of qualifications and part qualifications; SQA reports
indicator_protocol: % increase in registered qualifications and part qualifications based on unit standards registered

indicator: Number of expired qualifications and part qualifications based on unit standards reviewed

key_sector_challenge: Outdated policies, guidelines and operational instruments and the need for new ones to meet the functions requirements specified in the SQA Act 2021.
strategic_objective: Review, develop and implement policies, guidelines and operational instruments
indicator: Number of policies, guidelines and operational instruments reviewed and developed
responsible: Principal Quality Assurance Officers; Principal Standards Setting Officers
indicator_protocol: Updated and new policies, guidelines and operational instruments

indicator: Number of areas identified for partnerships and linkages
indicator_protocol: Strengthened links and partnerships with local and international partners and stakeholders

key_sector_challenge: Limitations in fulfilling quality assurance requirements by providers
strategic_objective: Provide guidance and support to providers to expedite the processes of programme accreditation, school inspection, institutional accreditation and Recognition of Prior Learning (RPL)
indicator: Number of capacity building workshops and working meetings held for guidance of providers per year
indicator_protocol: Number of providers benefitted from training and technical support.

key_sector_challenge: The majority of services of the SQA offered to providers and clients are non-fee paying.
strategic_objective: Review, develop and implement a fee structure for the different services of the SQA
indicator: Number of services for which fee structure has been reviewed or developed
indicator_protocol: Fee structure for Programme Accreditation; Institutional Accreditation; Recognition and Evaluation of Qualifications; and RPL

key_sector_challenge: There is limited monitoring mechanisms for assurance of compliance by providers.

indicator: Tools for monitoring implementation of accredited programmes developed and implemented

indicator_protocol: Monitoring tools; Adherence to implementati on requirements of accredited programmes
